title: Find Explosives
content:
Find Explosives Type Quest Chapter Act I Location Grymforge Reward ???

Find Explosives is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Find Explosives can be acquired during Act I. Completing Find Explosives will progress the story forward.

Find Explosives Objectives

Find Smokepowder: Brithvar mentioned that a deep gnome fled with some smokepowder. Her crew should know more. Find the smokepowder reserve: Philomeen left behind a reserve of smokepowder. It should clear the cave-in. Try to clear the cave-in: We
